meanings.definition: Of or relating to the material world
meanings.sent1: The worldliest concerns of the villagers were about their crops and livestock.
meanings.sent2: She preferred to focus on the worldliest matters like fashion and technology.
meanings.sent3: In the worldliest of debates, they argued over the best brand of soap.
meanings.sent4: His mind was filled with the worldliest thoughts, always centered on money and possessions.
meanings.sent5: The worldliest aspects of city life included bustling markets and towering skyscrapers.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a focus on material possessions and pleasures
meanings.sent1: Their worldliest desires revolved around owning the latest gadgets and designer clothes.
meanings.sent2: Living a worldliest lifestyle, she indulged in luxury vacations and expensive jewelry.
meanings.sent3: The worldliest of all gifts he received was a diamond-encrusted watch.
meanings.sent4: Her room was decorated in the worldliest style, with gold accents and plush furnishings.
meanings.sent5: The worldliest people in town were known for their extravagant parties and lavish spending.

meanings.definition: Having extensive knowledge or experience of the world
meanings.sent1: As the worldliest traveler in the group, he knew the best routes and hidden gems.
meanings.sent2: She was considered the worldliest professor due to her vast understanding of different cultures.
meanings.sent3: The worldliest explorer in history discovered new lands and ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent4: His stories were always the worldliest, filled with adventures from every corner of the globe.
meanings.sent5: The worldliest diplomat was able to navigate complex international relations with ease.
